Name: Raise Shield
Description: Raise your shield to Block all incoming blockable hits.  Blocking too much damage while your shield is raised may stagger you.

Tags.Name: Channeling
Tags.Description: Channeling Skills can be held down to gain power or continue to using the Skill for a longer period of time.
